Header: US assures continued support to Sri Lanka
Content: The United States has assured continued support to Sri Lanka to minimize the damages inflicted by disasters. This assurance was given by the US Ambssador to Sri Lanka to Minister Ranjith Maddumabandra. The meeting between the US Ambassador to Sri Lanka Alaina Teplitz and Minister of State Administration, Disaster Management and Rural Affairs Ranjith Maddumabandara took place in Colombo. Their discussions centred on the disastrous situation that could be experienced in the next few days in the island with the Southwest monsoon conditions and the initiatives that had so far been taken to face the drought. Pointing out that the United States was always with Sri Lanka for her support, the US Ambassador opined that her country would extend full support to the island during a disastrous situation. Minister Rnjith Maddumabandara apprised her of the action Sri Lanka has so far taken during a disastrous situation. Ambassador Alaina Teplitz further said that the United States would do its utmost to extend full support to Sri Lanka continuously.
